"text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "The ~TiddlyWiki help page on [[Page and tiddler layout customisation|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/Page%2520and%2520tiddler%2520layout%2520customisation.html]] has a customisation site|http://tw5custom.tiddlyspot.com/]] provides more detailed instructions and uses the example of a button that creates a new tiddler from a template. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT HOLDER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.\n" }, "$:/plugins/.dtn/new-from-skeleton/readme": { "title": "$:/plugins/.dtn/new-from-skeleton/readme", "created": "20190118100926205", "modified": "20190503180914825", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "This plugin adds the following button to the View Toolbar:\n\n{{$:/plugins/.dtn/new-from-skeleton/button/image}}\n\nWhen pressed, it creates a draft tiddler based on the skeleton tiddler [[$:/config/plugins/.dtn/new-from-skeleton/skeleton]].\n\nEdit the skeleton tiddler from time to time as desired.\n\n!!! Configure button location in View Toolbar (optional)\n\nTo configure where the button appears in the toolbar, edit the //list// field in the `$:/tags/ViewToolbar` tiddler. This is not an entirely intuitive process -- it involves:\n\n* Opening the advanced search dialog (click the magnifying glass icon next to the search field),\n* Selecting 'Shadows' tab,\n* Entering `$:/tags/ViewToolbar` in the advanced search field,\n* Clicking on the exactly matching result, i.e., `$:/tags/ViewToolbar` rather than `SystemTag: $:/tags/ViewToolbar`, to open the tiddler,\n* Clicking on the 'Edit this tiddler' icon to open the tiddler for editing,\n* Locating the //list// field, and\n* Adding [[$:/plugins/.dtn/new-from-skeleton/button]] to the appropriate place in the list.\n\n!!! Tiddler naming\n\nThe tiddlers in this plugin do not follow the standard naming conventions for core ui buttons. Instead, the tiddler naming conventions for plugins are followed, e.g., except for configuration plugins the tiddlers have the name stem `$:/plugins/.dtn/new-from-skeleton/`.\n" } } }
